mapper.select: select count(*) from ADMIN where NAME = #{admin.name} and PWD = #{admin.pwd}
select * from MEMBER inner join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO left outer join OWNER on MEMBER.EMAIL = OWNER.EMAIL where MEMBER.EMAIL = #{email}
select count(*) from MEMBER join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO

select * from ( select ROWNUM rnum, aa.* from (
select * from MEMBER join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO where MEMBER.NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from MEMBER join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO where MEMBER.EMAIL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from MEMBER join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO where MEMBER.BIRTH like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from MEMBER join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO where MEMBER.GRADE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from MEMBER join AUTHORITY on MEMBER.A_NO = AUTHORITY.A_NO where AUTHORITY.A_NAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
)aa)
where rnum>#{page.startRow} and rnum<=#{page.endRow}
